entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: McCreary 01:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -27.6°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
